channel.title: New puzzles.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "New puzzles." - Puzzles have changed. Here's the new ones (That I'm getting on an alt)

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: Your guess is as good as mine. It's been well over half a year that BvS has been out ( I'm not sure exactly HOW long, myself ), and the Utility Belt is a recent thing as it is, so I'd say don't look forward to one coming soon…

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
in other words when there are some promotion of a game or a movie again, like
->the professor's hat: promotion from the professor layton game
->the utiliy belt from the batman movie

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: The only two with bonus items are the 7th and 8th puzzles right now. Anything after the 7th puzzle is added at McMaster's discretion, not at a regular rate or anything.

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: when are new ones with new bonus item available??

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
@Anonymous poster: There is a link two posts above yours. That question and its answer are on that page.

Please try looking first, next time.

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: K-Dog, Billy, and Spot all line up at the front of the village, and start running at the same time, in the same direction, around and around the village. K-Dog takes can run around the village four times a minute. Billy can run around the village three times a minute, and Spot can run around the village two times a minute. how many SECONDS will it take before they all are lined up together again. Whats the answer anyone?

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: thx for help

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
34

http://bvs.wikidot.com/mission:hooray-for-puzzles

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: You have a digital clock that shows the time of day. How many minutes per day does the clock have the same number three or more times in a row? (for example- '1-11' would count). Note that it is a regular clock, and not a military-time clock….. Can someone help me with this puzzle pls ?

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: and my village is Relentless can any of you send some alts over to help and state your village when applying so we can add you as allies

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: It took me sometime to figure this puzzle out but the answer is 21214541212. this is definetly the correct answer. :-) glad to help

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Anyone now the new puzzle answer its kinda hard
The Name of it is Prize Time

item.content:encoded: i thought you guys wouldn't notice the new puzzles

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: thx, I thought I was missing out on a nice stamina boost XD

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: Yes, we are all having those on alternative characters. If you already have the Hat it's nothing for you.

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
where are the puzzles?

Is it because I got the hat a month ago?

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
If i didn't miss anything the answer is $95.

If the tag costs 500 more than the tag it means that is the price of the case +500.
510-500 =10
10 / 2 =5 (Because is 500 MORE than the tag. 5 to mach the case price and 5 for the case)
100 - 5 =95

Hope i helped.

Edit1: Dang! Schon got it 4 minutes earlier =P

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: Schon is correct. Thanks a bunch, and someone could edit the Professor Layton-page on Missions. Or me.

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: Just the Case is getting on my nerves. I've tried both 90 and 0, so those are not the correct answers.

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded: tag = 505 case =5, if you want the case and give them 100 your change should be 100-5 = 95. Unless i'm reading it wrong.

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
Just the Case

The Ninja Shop has a new item! Get a Special Explosive Tag, and the case to hold it, for only 510 Ryo. The Tag costs 500 more than the case, normally, and you just want the case. If you give them 100 Ryo for it, how much change should you get back?

-This is giving me some trouble.

item.title: Re: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
I just started, and that was my first puzzle, with the second being the same as on the page for the puzzles ( the Spies puzzle ).

Today, this is the third puzzle I was given:

Clone Training

You can do Clone Jutsu once a minute. You walk into a room and perform the Jutsu, and there are two of you. After the first minute, there are two of you. After another minute, there are four of you, and so on. If the room is filled with you and your clones in ten minutes, how many minutes would it have taken if you walked in with two of you?

Answer: 9

item.title: New puzzles.
item.content:encoded:
First puzzle:

You are in a cold, dark room. There is a fireplace, a stove, and an oil lamp. You only have one match. What do you light first?

Answer: match
